metadata.comments: This playbook uses the Azure Firewall connector to add IP Address to the Threat Intel Allow list based on the Azure Sentinel Incident
metadata.author: Dharma Reddy, Azure Firewall

body.message:
Azure Firewall Playbook performed the following action:

IP Address :  @{items('Each_malicious_IP_Address_Entity_present_in_the_Incident')?['Address']}

Got Virus Total Report  :

Country  :  @{body('Ip_scan_report_V3')?['data']?['attributes']?['country']}
Continent : @{body('Ip_scan_report_V3')?['data']?['attributes']?['continent']}
ASN : @{body('Ip_scan_report_V3')?['data']?['attributes']?['asn']}
AS_Owner L : @{body('Ip_scan_report_V3')?['data']?['attributes']?['as_owner']}

Total Votes :
 
 Malicious : @{body('Ip_scan_report_V3')?['data']?['attributes']?['total_votes']?['malicious']}
 Positives Votes : @{body('Ip_scan_report_V3')?['data']?['attributes']?['total_votes']?['harmless']}
 Negative Votes :  @{body('Ip_scan_report_V3')?['data']?['attributes']?['total_votes']?['malicious']}
 Suspicious Votes: @{body('Ip_scan_report_V3')?['data']?['attributes']?['last_analysis_stats']?['suspicious']}
 Number of reports saying that is Undetected : @{body('Ip_scan_report_V3')?['data']?['attributes']?['last_analysis_stats']?['undetected']}
Network : @{body('Ip_scan_report_V3')?['data']?['attributes']?['network']}

Action Taken in Azure Firewall

Added IP Address to the Firewall Policy Name :

Add_comment_to_incident_with_the_endpoin.description: Provide end point information and action taken in the incident information message

Append_-_IP_Address_to_Threat_intel_allo.description: Append IP Address to the Threat intel allow list

Assign_Threat_intel_allow_list_values.description: Variable to store the list of existing IP Addresses

Creates_or_updates_the_specified_Firewal.description: Post the list of IP Addresses along with IP Address present from the Incident

Gets_the_specified_Firewall_Policy.description: Get firewall policy information based on  the SOC selection
